title: iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: The most advanced iPhone yet with titanium design, A17 Pro chip, and professional camera system. Features a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display and up to 1TB storage.

title: Samsung 65-inch 4K QLED Smart TV
description: Experience stunning picture quality with Quantum Dot technology, HDR support, and smart TV features. Perfect for movie nights and gaming with low input lag.

title: MacBook Air M3
description: Ultra-thin and lightweight laptop with M3 chip, 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display, and up to 18 hours of battery life. Perfect for work and creativity.

title: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise canceling headphones with exceptional sound quality, 30-hour battery life, and crystal-clear call quality.

title: Nintendo Switch OLED
description: Gaming console with vibrant 7-inch OLED screen, enhanced audio, and versatile play modes. Includes dock and Joy-Con controllers.

title: Levi's 501 Original Jeans
description: Classic straight-leg jeans with authentic fit and timeless style. Made from premium denim with button fly and five-pocket styling.

title: Nike Air Max 270 Sneakers
description: Lifestyle sneakers with large Air unit in the heel for all-day comfort. Features breathable mesh upper and modern silhouette.

title: Adidas Ultraboost 23 Running Shoes
description: Premium running shoes with Boost midsole technology, Primeknit upper, and Continental rubber outsole for superior traction.

title: Ralph Lauren Polo Shirt
description: Classic polo shirt in soft cotton piqué with iconic pony logo. Available in multiple colors with ribbed collar and cuffs.

title: Zara Leather Jacket
description: Modern leather jacket with asymmetric zip closure, multiple pockets, and fitted silhouette. Perfect for adding edge to any outfit.

title: KitchenAid Stand Mixer
description: Professional 5-quart stand mixer with 10 speeds and tilt-head design. Includes dough hook, wire whip, and flat beater attachments.

title: Dyson V15 Detect Vacuum Cleaner
description: Cordless vacuum with laser dust detection, powerful suction, and up to 60 minutes run time. Features advanced filtration system.

title: Instant Pot Duo 7-in-1 Pressure Cooker
description: Multi-functional electric pressure cooker that replaces 7 kitchen appliances. Features smart programs and safety mechanisms.

title: West Elm Mid-Century Sofa
description: Stylish 3-seater sofa with clean lines, tapered legs, and premium upholstery. Perfect centerpiece for modern living rooms.

title: Philips Hue Smart Light Starter Kit
description: Smart lighting system with 4 color-changing bulbs and bridge. Control via smartphone app with millions of colors and dimming.

title: Peloton Bike+
description: Premium exercise bike with rotating HD touchscreen, immersive workouts, and real-time metrics. Includes access to live classes.

title: Wilson Pro Staff Tennis Racket
description: Professional tennis racket with precision and control for advanced players. Features carbon fiber construction and comfortable grip.

title: Bowflex Adjustable Dumbbells
description: Space-saving adjustable dumbbells that replace 15 sets of weights. Quick weight changes from 5 to 52.5 pounds per dumbbell.

title: Fitbit Charge 5 Fitness Tracker
description: Advanced fitness tracker with built-in GPS, heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery life. Water resistant design.

title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
description: Bestselling novel by Taylor Jenkins Reid about reclusive Hollywood icon Evelyn Hugo who finally decides to tell her life story.

title: Atomic Habits by James Clear
description: Practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones. Learn how small changes can make a remarkable difference.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home 4K Blu-ray
description: Blockbuster superhero film in stunning 4K resolution with Dolby Atmos sound. Includes bonus features and digital copy.

title: Fenty Beauty Foundation
description: Full-coverage liquid foundation with 50 shades for all skin tones. Long-wearing, transfer-resistant formula with buildable coverage.

title: Drunk Elephant Vitamin C Serum
description: Potent antioxidant serum with 15% L-Ascorbic Acid to brighten and firm skin. Helps reduce signs of aging and environmental damage.

title: Dyson Airwrap Hair Styler
description: Multi-styler that curls, waves, and smooths hair without extreme heat. Uses Coanda effect for voluminous styles and reduced damage.

title: Tesla Model 3 All-Weather Floor Mats
description: Custom-fit floor mats designed specifically for Tesla Model 3. Made from premium materials with easy-to-clean surface.

title: Chemical Guys Car Wash Kit
description: Complete car washing kit with premium shampoo, microfiber towels, wash mitt, and bucket. Everything needed for professional results.

title: Garmin DashCam 67W
description: Wide-angle dash camera with 1440p video recording, GPS logging, and incident detection. Features voice control and smartphone connectivity.

title: LEGO Creator Expert Taj Mahal
description: Intricate 5923-piece LEGO set recreating the iconic Taj Mahal. Features detailed architecture and comes with comprehensive building instructions.

title: Monopoly Board Game
description: Classic property trading board game for 2-8 players. Build your real estate empire and bankrupt your opponents in this timeless game.

title: PlayStation 5 Console
description: Next-generation gaming console with 4K gaming, ray tracing, and ultra-high-speed SSD. Includes DualSense wireless controller.

title: iPhone 14 Pro
description: Pro camera system with 48MP main camera, A16 Bionic chip, and Dynamic Island. Available in Space Black, Silver, Gold, and Deep Purple.

title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9
description: Premium Android tablet with 11-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, S Pen included, and desktop-class performance for work and play.

title: AirPods Pro 2nd Generation
description: Wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, transparency mode, and spatial audio. Features MagSafe charging case.

title: Canon EOS R6 Mark II Camera
description: Full-frame mirrorless camera with 24.2MP sensor, 4K video recording, and advanced autofocus system. Perfect for professional photography.

title: H&M Oversized Blazer
description: Trendy oversized blazer in a soft fabric blend. Features notched lapels, front buttons, and functional pockets. Perfect for layering.

title: Uniqlo Heattech Ultra Warm Crew Neck Long Sleeve T-Shirt
description: Ultra-warm base layer with advanced heat-generating technology. Moisture-wicking fabric keeps you warm and dry in cold weather.

title: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star High Top
description: Iconic canvas sneakers with timeless style. Features rubber sole, metal eyelets, and classic star logo. Available in multiple colors.

title: Patagonia Down Sweater Jacket
description: Lightweight down jacket with 800-fill-power goose down. Wind and water-resistant shell with recycled polyester construction.

title: IKEA Hemnes Bookshelf
description: Solid wood bookshelf with adjustable shelves. Clean Scandinavian design that fits perfectly in any room. Easy assembly required.

title: Ninja Foodi Personal Blender
description: Compact personal blender perfect for smoothies and protein shakes. Features powerful motor and to-go cups with lids.

title: Cuisinart Classic Stainless Steel Cookware Set
description: 10-piece stainless steel cookware set with aluminum base for even heat distribution. Dishwasher safe and oven safe up to 500°F.

title: Keurig K-Elite Coffee Maker
description: Single-serve coffee maker with strong brew button, iced coffee setting, and programmable auto-on feature. Works with all K-Cup pods.

title: Vitamix A3500 Ascent Series Blender
description: Professional-grade blender with variable speed control, pulse feature, and self-cleaning function. Perfect for smoothies, soups, and more.

title: Yoga Mat - Premium 6mm Thick
description: High-quality yoga mat with superior grip and cushioning. Made from eco-friendly materials with alignment lines for perfect poses.

title: Therabody Theragun Elite Massage Gun
description: Professional-grade percussion massage device with smart app integration, customizable speed range, and ultra-quiet operation.

title: Oura Ring Gen3 Sleep & Activity Tracker
description: Smart ring that tracks sleep, activity, and recovery metrics. Lightweight titanium design with 7-day battery life and water resistance.

title: Philips Sonicare DiamondClean Smart Electric Toothbrush
description: Premium electric toothbrush with app connectivity, multiple cleaning modes, and smart brush head recognition. Includes charging glass.

title: KONG Classic Dog Toy
description: Durable rubber dog toy that can be stuffed with treats. Satisfies natural chewing instincts and provides mental stimulation for dogs.

title: Purina Pro Plan High Protein Dog Food
description: Premium dry dog food with real chicken as the first ingredient. Formulated to support muscle development and overall health.
